name: Prima facie evidence Cross References Civil rights commission, see chapter 368. Discrimination in public accommodations, see chapter 489. Law Journals and Reviews Timesharing in the 1990s.  I HBJ No. 13, at pg. 89.
text: Prima facie evidence.  In a proceeding under this chapter, a written, printed, or visual communication, advertisement, or other form of publication, or written inquiry, or record, or other document purporting to have been made by a person is prima facie evidence that it was authorized by the person. [L 1967, c 193, §20; HRS ; gen ch 1985]
